title: Low-income, rural kids at higher risk for second- or third-hand smoke exposure

title_detail.value: Low-income, rural kids at higher risk for second- or third-hand smoke exposure

summary: Infants and toddlers in low-income, rural areas may be at higher risk for second- and third-hand smoke than previously reported, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Infants and toddlers in low-income, rural areas may be at higher risk for second- and third-hand smoke than previously reported, according to new research.
